nodes.text: Star Wars: Grievous Getaway is a mobile video game that was published by THQ Wireless and released on November 8, 2005. The game takes place during the events of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. In the game, the player controls Obi-Wan Kenobi riding Boga as he chases General Grievous on his wheel bike through the planet Utapau. The game has five levels. After completing the game it is possible to play again and choose either character, Obi-Wan Kenobi or Grievous.
Although the gameplay itself contains no music, the game's menu plays a MIDI version of "Grievous and the Droids" by John Williams from the soundtrack for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
